ing: 1 pound ground beef or ground turkey
1 (5.4 ounce) package KnorrÂ® Menu Flavors Rice Sidesâ„¢ - Steak Fajitas
1 (16 ounce) can red kidney beans, rinsed and drained
des: "Your favorite fajita flavors are simmered in this quick and hearty chili with beans dish."
ins:
Brown ground beef with onion in 4-quart stockpot; drain, if desired.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer covered, stirring occasionally, 7 minutes or until rice is tender.
Garnish, if desired, with sour cream, shredded Cheddar cheese and/or sliced green onions.
